biotools.summary: Multi-platform (Windows and Linux) toolbox which covers all the steps of the iterative identification procedure: local and global sensitivity analysis, local and global ranking of parameters, parameter estimation, identifiability analysis and optimal experimental design.

bioschemas.name: AMIGO2
